examples.claim: Fraudulent pop-up messages displayed during the June 2025 Cointelegraph hack falsely claimed that users had been randomly selected for a new token giveaway as part of a “fair launch initiative.” They further misled users by asserting that the smart contract behind the promoted token had been audited by CertiK.
